title: Carpe Antiperspirant Underarm & Face Package Deal (1Underarm Clinical Strength, & 1Face Sweat Absorbing), Stop Excessive Sweat, Dermatologist Recommended
description: Carpe Underarm Antiperspirant was created to help manage the symptoms of hyperhidrosis and stop the discomfort of excessive sweating. Our clinically tested and dermatologist recommended underarm lotion goes on smooth, and is gentle on your skin. Carpe reduces body odor by stopping sweat where it starts, no overpowering fragrance needed. Our natural eucalyptus scent is great for both men and women, and keeps you smelling fresh and clean no matter where your day takes you.
**NOTE: Packaging may vary between foam applicator or rounded dispensing plate. Antiperspirant contents are unchanged between the different packaging.**

A unique gelled powder formulation that delivers superior absorbent benefits to keep your skin feeling comfortable and dry. The oil-free formula applies with a cooling watery feel and delivers lightweight hydration with Jojoba Esters. Silica Microspheres creates a perfect smooth sweat absorbing shield along the surface that immediately improves the feel and look of skin. Pores look minimized, lines and wrinkles appear filled in, and skin is shielded from sweat.  A combination of antioxidants and vitamins delivered from Colloidal Oatmeal, Aloe Vera, and Niacinamide help soothe and protect skin.
